duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop equipment and processes that meet safety codes, policies, and guidelines.
Provide functional guidance in the design, development, and optimization of production equipment.
Lead single or multiple product or process improvement projects with a financial scope of up to $5 million.
Seek, recognize, define, and solve problems to achieve unit objectives.
Develop knowledge and skills in leadership of the application of engineering principles, scientific analysis, problem solving, and project management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent degree from an accredited college or university
